replies.msg:
plan 左去台灣6日，預左3日去台中/台南，另外3日去台北
唔該大家幫幫手

Going to Taiwan on vacation over the summer is your best bet because the new Taiwanese dollar 💵 has dropped significantly over the six and a half months. The weather forecast is for a hot and sunny day tomorrow during the daytime and a breezy warm night, just right for swimming 🏊 and sailing ⛵️ Dry sunny spells and scattered rain showers are forecast for the day after tomorrow.
台南 草衙道 鈴鹿 義大（咪撚去墾丁）

台中大把
高美濕地
清境
車埕
etc
